name: BigInt Labs
body:
BigInt Labs is a web based products development shop where we create aesthetic and user friendly products for web and mobile. Our team is a group of engineers who left their corporate jobs to do what they love - converting ideas to reality!

We specialize in designing MVPs for startup ideas, web and mobile applications. We love to build on Python/Django and Android but we have experience with a variety of technologies. 

You are an entrepreneur trying to get a quick prototype to test the feasibility of your idea
or a business trying to build your online presence

We are the most customer friendly development experience for you. No bullshit, we only focus on understanding your requirements to help you achieve your objective. Our strength not only lies in technology, we know the importance of communication and client satisfaction. With our team's MBA background, we know a thing or two about accountability and importance of customer happiness. We will give you our candid advice on what will be best for you.

Lets work together.

Send us any inquiry at dev@bigintlabs.com
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
